name: Desert Garden
description:
Controls:

 A - move left  D- move right   

Space-bar - jump  

 "J" roll over (double jump) 

Combo is reset if you touch the ground. Bigger combo give more rewards.

Game made for Mini Jam 53 with theme "Oasis". 

Music is from OpenGameArt https://opengameart.org/content/jump-and-run-8-bit

Graphics are original.
